name: eManager Template Package
summary: An XEZ file is a template package used by X-Genics eManager, a content management suite for X-Genics SmartApps. It is a renamed .ZIP file that contains a collection of eManager templates. These templates are comprised of XML files and graphics.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename .xez to .zip ; open with any Zip-decompression utility
